assets.description: Kima is an asset-agnostic interoperability infrastructure that connects blockchain networks and legacy financial systems, enabling secure, scalable cross-chain transactions and seamless communication across ecosystems.
assets.extended_description: Kima is an asset-agnostic interoperability infrastructure designed to bridge the gap between blockchain networks and traditional financial systems. By providing a unified platform for secure and scalable cross-ecosystem  transactions, Kima enables seamless transfers across different ecosystems, including digital assets and legacy financial systems. Its patent-pending architecture eliminates vulnerabilities associated with smart contracts and key management, ensuring a secure environment for high-volume transactions. Kima’s innovative approach provides financial institutions and developers with the tools needed to create interoperable solutions that operate across both traditional and blockchain-based systems, driving the future of decentralized finance and financial services.
assets.name: KIMA
